actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to enable Indian tribal governments to provide facilities necessary to carry out essential governmental functions.
short_title: Indian Tribal Government Lease Agreement Act

summary.text: Indian Tribal Government Lease Agreement Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into facility lease agreements with Indian tribal governments for use in carrying out essential governmental functions. Establishes in the Treasury the Tribal Government Lease Fund.

titles.title: Indian Tribal Government Lease Agreement Act
A bill to enable Indian tribal governments to provide facilities necessary to carry out essential governmental functions.
